indexterm.see: ISO Entity Sets, Box and Line Drawing

refmeta.refentrytitle: Box and Line Drawing Character Entities (%isobox;)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Box and Line Drawing Character Entities

refsynopsisdiv.para:
The %isobox; parameter entity includes the ISO character entities with the public identifier:
ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Box and Line Drawing//EN
